content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) and a burner-inserter at position (60.5, -61.5) that is connected to the furnace.

### Inserter System at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position (61.5, -61.5), a wooden-chest at position (62.5, -61.5), and another burner-inserter at position (62.5, -60.5).

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore-pump at position (107.5, -33.5) and a pipe group with multiple pipes connected to it.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and multiple pipes connected to it.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam-engine at position (117.5, -30.5) and multiple pipes connected to it, as well as a small-electric-pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a belt at position (63.5, -53.5) and another belt at position (64.5, -53.5).

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when placing entities next to existing entities:
	+ Make sure to check for existing entities at the desired position before placing a new entity.
	+ Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to existing ones.
* Errors when connecting belts to chests:
	+ Use an inserter to input items into a chest instead of connecting belts directly to it.
* Errors when inserting items into furnaces:
	+ Make sure to have the required items in the inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### NAMESPACE
* Important variables:
	+ `inserter`: a burner-inserter entity
	+ `chest`: a wooden-chest entity
	+ `furnace`: a stone-furnace entity
	+ `pipe`: a pipe entity
	+ `boiler`: a boiler entity
	+ `steam_engine`: a steam-engine entity
	+ `small_electric_pole`: a small-electric-pole entity
* Utility functions:
	+ `place_entity_next_to`: a function to place an entity next to an existing entity
	+ `connect_entities`: a function to connect two entities
	+ `insert_item`: a function to insert an item into a furnace
*i Falure modes:
	+ `place_entity_next_to` failed due to existing entity at the desired position
	+ `connect_entities` failed due to incorrect entity type
	+ `insert_item` failed due to insufficient items in the inventory
* Success modes:
	+ `place_entity_next_to` successfully placed an entity next to an existing entity
	+ `connect_entities` successfully connected two entities
	+ `insert_item` successfully inserted an item into a furnace
